data.name: Roll20 Wood Sepia Theme v1
data.description: A Roll20 theme with wood handout and character sheet backgrounds, scroll Journal background, and a general gray, sepia, gold, and wood color scheme. More pleasant on the eyes than straight white, and not as extreme as a full dark theme.
